tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: She has been an incredible source of support and guidance throughout my pregnancy journey and during the delivery of my baby. Her expertise, care, and compassion made all the difference. I am deeply grateful for everything she has done for me and my baby. Thank you ma'am from the bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a great experience with dr Mamtha . My pregnancy got confirmed in front of her only while we visited just for routine checkup. Throughout the pregnancy, she was so supportive and kind. She explained everything so nicely that our 9 month journey passed without any hiccups. On my delivery day, we went to the hospital in evening, she came and encouraged me for normal delivery as I was only 2 cm dilated , then after about 3 hours she came back( though everyone was expecting delivery in morning only) as I was dilated to 6 cm and delivered happened around midnight. Trust me i gave up on normal delivery but it was only doctor who made it possible, it was normal with forceps as I was really tired with so much pain. Doctor was there at night till I got shifted to my room and handed over to my husband . She explained everything to him as our child got hurt a bit on head due to forceps but with god grace everything was good and it was only superficial scar. We are very happy to have her as our doctor as she handled the situation brilliantly and did what was necessary. Now after a month me and my son both are healthy and happy. Thanku so much doctor for taking care of me and my child *** ***** ** ******* ** **** *** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We went to Dr. Mamtha for my first pregnancy scans and check ups. The services that I receive from her is excellent. Dr. Mamtha is very straight forward, she don't suggest any unwanted medicines until it's very much required for you. And she ensure that I am properly informed about my health and care. We have visited her in Suraksha hospital for my first pregnancy. She is very practical, calm and friendly. She always listens to our query very patiently and given good suggestions. She explained everything to me in a very clear manner. She has made our pregnancy journey very smooth. She used to explain upcoming test and scans required for me. On the day of my delivery my water broke all of sudden at 37th week, I called her she asked me not to panic and reach hospital asap as I was soo scared. After check up I was given medicine to increase my pain. During delivery my baby's pulse was not fine she encouraged me to push and it was only because of her I was able to deliver baby naturally (forceps assisted). Big thanks to Dr. Mamtha. *** ** *** **** ** *** *******
I would highly recommend her to everyone without a single doubt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had a bad experience in this clinic. The Doctor and the receptionist/lab person *** ****** ******* **** ********** *** very rude. We visited during the trimester, and we went through internal scanning and blood test which costed 7000. The lab person there is terrible, *** *** ****** **** ** ***** ***** ***************** they mentioned they will inform us how the test result is. But we did not get any call from them and the even to get the wrong result they delayed it further 2 more days. Even the blood group they gave is AB ve when I am O ve. We realised it wrong after a month and once we informed them, they were least bothered and said that lab technician will be available only after 3 days and they donâ€™t care or took responsibility of there mistake. I had to call several times to get in touch with the Doctor and she responded with a very harsh attitude and never initiated to call us back and say sorry or gave the money back. They have no concern for the patients and not worried or least bothered about the complaints.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A lot we owe to !! A lot we want to thank you for !! A lot to appreciate about !! My wife truly feel blessed to have Dr. Mamatha Reddy as our gynecologist doctor, as mentor, as friend and supportive system. We are visiting Dr. Mamatha since 2018. Here is our experience and story with Doctor.It was my wife's first pregnancy; Me and my wife visited Dr. Mamatha for first time during 7th week of pregnancy. Unfortunately pregnancy got terminated as miscarriage. Dr. Mamatha has been very great mentor since to my wife and explained us about such losses not to be blamed ourselves. With Dr. advices and positive talks helped us to overcome this loss.In Oct 2019, My wife was again carrying and we started our routine check ups with Dr. Mamatha Reddy with all new joyful attitude.  With all excellent care and treatment throughout pregnancy, on 23rd June 2020 we blessed with baby boy as normal delivery though my wife experienced complications in 7th month and having miscarriage in past. Mamatha ma'am have wonderful skilled hands. Thank you for being dedicated, thoughtful and compassionate doctor that you are! You always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. Dr. Mamatha Reddy is 'Hero' in our family. Thank you again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi
I have been consulting with doctor Mamatha during my pregnancy journey.
*** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** *******from the beginning she was very patience in explaining things to me and clearing all my doubts. She never panics patients, she talks with such a confidence even if we have any issue we feel like it may get cured.

I had less water level, but though she gave a try for normal delivery....she induced pain for labour and waited along with me for more than 18 hours....she visited hospital very frequently to check how was I doing and did cervix got opened or not. Night she stayed in the hospital and making visit during midnight's.

Finally, due to some issue - she had to do ke c-section, she handled with very care and I was blessed with an baby girl.

Trust me ther are still some doctors who try for normal delivery as well...Dr Mamatha is one among them.

I would highly recommend everyone to visit her during pregnancy.

review: I have consulted her for my second pregnancy. I was referred by my friend and trust me she is very good doctor. She helped me in my full 9 month pregnancy and given solutions to all my queries. She is very trained in her field and know how to deal with all kind of situations. Me and my husband both are very happy with her treatment and in her guidance we are blessed with sweet little baby girl.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is really good *** **** ******* *********** ****** She doesnâ€™t scare you with negative words like other doctors do. Very practical and to the point. It was my first pregnancy and with her guidance I delivered a healthy child. She always has a smile on her face. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr mamatha is the only one i trust for my rainbow babies when i had an acute case of pcod when the other gynaecologists had no hope in me she had all the courage and trust in me to help me in natural conception with minimal amount of medications or invasive procedures  she guided me really very well every step and i still keep all her tips in handy i rely only on dr mamatha for my health related advise and consultation she is a very friendly doctor and interacts well with the patients and is a very positive personality

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** **** ******* we have experienced during my wife first pregnancy... Because of her only,we have got healthy child.I remember the time when my first baby born..She was there for entire time span, right from the good news till the baby born.There was some tough time too,but every time we consulted her,we came out with positive response.The kindness, friendliness and the positive smile on her face.. will cured the pain, tension too.A lots of thanks to ma'am... for all  really love u ma'am, with great respect
Doctor is very experienced and friendly. Explanation of the concern is well listened and the given treatment responds well too.
